pages.title: Pharaoh's Sword
pages.text: Nobody knows who the first Pharaoh was. But whoever they were, the Architects gave them this blade. The $(thing)Pharaoh's Sword$() hits insanely hard and makes its wielder immune to fire.$(br2)And it doesn't break. Ever. The Architects built it to outlast civilizations. Judging by the fact that we're reading about it, they succeeded.

pages.title: Ritual Crafting
pages.text: This sword cannot be crafted on a table. It requires a $(bold)Ground Ritual$(). Drop the following 4 items on the ground, close to each other (within 1.5 blocks):$(br2)$(li)$(item)Inertial Stability Alloy$()$(li)$(item)Netherite Sword$()$(li)$(item)Nether Star$()$(li)$(item)Ancient Ankh$()$(br2)When all four items are near each other, the ritual triggers automatically with a burst of light and particles.

pages.title: Combat Properties
pages.text: $(bold)Damage$(): Extremely high$(br)$(bold)Fire Resistance$(): Passive while held$(br)$(bold)Durability$(): Unbreakable$(br2)$(italic)The Ankh is consumed in the ritual. Make sure you have a spare if you still want death protection.$()
